item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Advertising has us chasing cars and clothes. working jobs we hate, so we can buy shit we dont need." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You buy furniture. You tell yourself, this is the last sofa I will ever need in my life. Buy the sofa, then for a couple years you're satisfied that no matter what goes wrong, at least you've got your sofa issue handled. Then the right set of dishes. Then the perfect bed. The drapes. The rug. Then you're trapped in your lovely nest, and the things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Tim O'Brien
item.description: "And sometimes remembering will lead to a story, which makes it forever. That's what stories are for. Stories are for joining the past to the future. Stories are for those late hours in the night when you can't remember how you got from where you were to where you are. Stories are for eternity, when memory is erased, when there is nothing to remember except the story." -- Tim O'Brien

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Pearl Jam
item.description: "If you hate something, don't you do it too?" -- Pearl Jam

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "I am happy to report that in the war between reality and romance, reality is not the stronger." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "I wonder why progress looks so much like destruction." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Chris Rock
item.description: "You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese, the Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named "Bush", "Dick", and "Colin." Need I say more?" -- Chris Rock

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy
